        public static java.util.List<LBOutboundEndpoint> getLBOutboundEndpointsList(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LBOutboundEndpoint> map)

        map - LBOutboundEndpoint map.
        Returns:
        list of LBOutboundEndpoints.

      • getWeightsList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getWeightsList(java.util.List<LBOutboundEndpoint> outboundEndpoints,
                                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map)
        Parameters:
        outboundEndpoints - LBOutboundEndpoints list.
        map - Weights map
        Returns:
        list of weights in the same order as outboundEndpoints.

        NOTE: This method expects that map should contain all keys available in list. Validations MUST be done before.

      • getHostAndPort

        public static java.lang.String getHostAndPort(java.lang.String inputUri)
        Parameters:
        inputUri - LBOutboundEndpoint's Uri.
        Returns:
        String of form 'hostname:port' if uri is valid. Otherwise, null.

      • getCookieValue

        public static java.lang.String getCookieValue(org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonMessage carbonMessage,
                                              LoadBalancerConfigContext context)
        Parameters:
        carbonMessage - Response from which host and port are to be identified.
        context - LoadBalancerConfigContext
        Returns:
        String of form 'hostname:port'

      • getSessionCookie

        public static java.lang.String getSessionCookie(java.lang.String cookieValue)
        Parameters:
        cookieValue - Inserted cookie value
        Returns:
        LB specific cookie.

        NOTE: This will be used when there is no cookie from BE.

        No scheduled is specified. So, there will be persistence until browser is closed. So this is a Session Cookie.

        //TODO: should we add path.?

      • addLBCookieToExistingCookie

        public static java.lang.String addLBCookieToExistingCookie(java.lang.String existingCookie,
                                                           java.lang.String lbCookieValue)
        Parameters:
        existingCookie - existing cookie from BE.
        lbCookieValue - generated cookie
        Returns:
        BE cookie value appended with LB specific cookie.

        The nature of this cookie (like HttpOnly, Age) is purely dependant on BE application server. LB uses those properties on AS IS basis.

      • getClientIP

        public static java.lang.String getClientIP(org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonMessage cMsg)
        Parameters:
        cMsg - Client's request.
        Returns:
        Client's IPAddress.

        It looks for the following HTTP request headers. 1) X-Forwarded-For 2) Client-IP 3) Remote-Addr

        NOTE: This method will be used to identify Client's IP in case of Client IP based hashing algorithms.

      • isValidIP

        public static boolean isValidIP(java.lang.String ipAddress)
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - IPAddress retrieved from Client's request.
        Returns:
        IPAddress is valid or not.

        It checks for both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

        This validation is not costly as doesn't makes any lookup or connection. It is RegEx and String Validation. So don't worry.

        public static void removeUnHealthyEndpoint(LoadBalancerConfigContext context,
                                           LoadBalancingAlgorithm algorithm,
                                           LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint)
